Reviews.Title: Toshiba Satellital
Reviews.Author: Fernando La Mota
Reviews.Content: Simple is perfect!!! Nothing else nothing more ! I'm really happy with this comp, the best quality for razonable price, excellent!

Reviews.Title: Love the big screen!!
Reviews.Author: Lori Martin
Reviews.Content: I had a laptop years ago and I hated it...gave it away.  But with the big screen and big keyboard it's easy to type and easy to see.Of course, I am also having to learn Windows 8 at the same time so it's making it much easier to learn to use both at the same time.

Reviews.Title: laptop
Reviews.Author: gerald R Coyle
Reviews.Content: I'm very happy with the computer, except that microsoft office was only temporary. I was not told this. It cost me $149.99 to buy it. This was disappointing.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: sunnydaye
Reviews.Content: working well, the battery runs down quickly and the volume is a little low, but all in, I love it.

Reviews.Title: Probably will return
Reviews.Author: Michael Powell "mikey6d3d"
Reviews.Content: Not 24 hours after ordering the price went down 40 dollars. I will probably not open and return and reorder.
